sentences.english: Accordingly, the issue of the orientation of business zone in the sub-center of city is frequently concerned.
sentences.chinese: 因此，商圈定位問題也一再被人們所關注。

sentences.english: Q7. Cambridge Circus is in which UK City?

sentences.english: In contrast, the Lido looks much rather calm.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，麗都商圈反倒平靜得多。

sentences.english: The park very close to Changshou Road, can enjoy longevity district matching the maturity.

sentences.english: Aging business circle, resolute don't run.
sentences.chinese: 老化的商圈，堅決不設點。

sentences.english: Today Dong is something of a celebrity in Chinese business circles.
sentences.chinese: 如今，董明珠已是商圈裏名角。

sentences.english: Review whole Guiyang city, the mature business that goes up without real significance is encircled.
sentences.chinese: 縱觀整個貴陽市，沒有真正意義上的成熟商圈。

sentences.english: After nearly 10 years of development, Lido values gradually mature.
sentences.chinese: 經過近10年的發展，麗都商圈漸漸成熟。
